text: Estela Rodríguez Villanueva (November 12, 1967 – April 10, 2022) was a Cuban judoka. She won silver medals at the 1992 and 1996 Summer Olympics. She used the illegal diuretic drug called furosemide at the 1996 Olympics, but was only issued a warning and was allowed to keep her medals. She was born in Santiago de Cuba, Cuba. Rodríguez died in Havana, Cuba on April 10, 2022 from cardiac arrest at the age of 54.Falleció la destacada judoca cubana Estela Rodríguez ==Notes== ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic medalists for Cuba Category:Judoka Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Estela Rodríguez
